note:
Kresimir Galovic
b. August 26, 1966
I'm an Art Historian from Zagreb, Croatia
Cartoons are one of my professional interests. I follow the history of caricature and contemporary production. One of the accents of my interest is the development of iconography motifs. On social networks, I have been running and administering ''Muzej karicature'' page (The Cartoon Museum, Zagreb), with more followers.
